item.title: The Latest Update On ‘Halo’ Season 3 After Its Netflix Arrival
item.description: Will Halo get a season 3 now that it's on Netflix, and the service could possibly pick up where it left off? Here's the latest update on that.

item.title: ‘Peacemaker’ Episode 8 Finale Theory Shot Down By James Gunn
item.description: Fans have developed a theory about Peacemaker episode 7 heading into episode 8, and James Gunn has stepped in to shut it down already.

item.title: Did Ed Gein Really Help Catch Ted Bundy, Like In The Netflix Show?
item.description: In Monster: The Ed Gein Story on Netflix, it's said that Gein gave the FBI information to catch Ted Bundy. Did that actually happen?
